Dont have it? Buy it
Already played it? Play it again
This game is amazing

Where do I even start... this game is one of the most unique and fun games in the gaming industry. At first it is a little hard understanding the mechanics but once you understand everything its a very fun puzzle game. Portal 2 is an extremely fun game with phenomenal story line and advanced puzzle mechanics with extremely good level design from the Valve team. Also the levels get more challenging over time to always make you think. Let me just also add that this game beat the Call of Duty franchise by miles. This is NOT a game that dies out a couple years after its release like most other games. Valve creates the most innovative games on the market and they are certainly  here to stay.  The reviews and active players daily just show how a great game ages over time UNLIKE cod and other hyped games. Also I'd like to thank Joseph for introducing me to such a great game.
Good game had lots of fun in coop as well as in single player campaign

[h1] "Portal 2", rien de plus √† dire. (fin si du coup) [/h1]
Portal 2 √©tait en promo durant les f√™tes de fin d'ann√©es, j'ai donc achet√© cette merveille sans h√©siter.
Je l'ai achet√© en pensant que le gameplay original et qui fait toujours sont effet aujourd'hui, m'amuserait certainement. J'ai eu Raison !
Mais ce qui ma bien fait plaisir en plus de √ßa c'est le lore de Portal !
Et mine de rien on s'attache vachement aux persos, surtout gr√¢ce √† la VF ( Et oui car, comme la plus part des jeu valves, les voix sont traduites !! )
Pour vous dire, le jeu ma bien marqu√© ! J'ai Failli chialer...
Sinon la COOP est elle aussi tr√®s compl√®te et tr√®s amusante !
Dans cette COOP on incarne deux poti robots, P-body et Atlas, qui son, eux aussi, attachant.

Apr√®s je pense que la plus part des gens connaissent ce Jeu maintenant mais pas tout le monde ne le connais ! Et puis je me devais de commenter ce jeu !!

Enfin bref, je le recommande BEAUCOUP

PS : C'est pas n√©cessaire de jouer au 1. C'est un peu comme un pilote parce-que on vous explique tout au d√©but du 2 et y'a pas grand choses √† savoir. Mais si vous voulez y aller √† fond commencez par le 1 ! Il est rapide (pour ma part je l'ai fini en 2h)

Widely considered one of the best games ever made, and rightly so. It's hard to find anything to criticize about Portal 2. Not only does it stay true to what made Portal so incredible, but introduces new game mechanics, characters, environments, graphical updates, and story elements that establish it as a premier example of how to create a sequel. Returning to Aperture Laboratories was such a great experience, as Valve did a fantastic job of making the environments feel both recognizable and new simultaneously. The plethora of new devices are fun, while also fitting perfectly in with the formula and world of Portal. The puzzles are a perfect level of difficulty, so as to provide a really satisfying sense of accomplishment if/when you can solve them on your own. Many of these puzzles take place in new locales that develop the simple yet engrossing story, and I thoroughly enjoyed learning more about the world and characters of Portal as I progressed through them. 

As the ending scene played out and I thought about my time with the game, I fully realized how much of personality, character, and identity the Portal series has and how incredibly well it developed it, especially in Portal 2. The series' gameplay, characters, soundtrack, level design, accessibility, depth, humor, characters, story, and environments are all remarkable by themselves, but its their combination that makes Portal [i]Portal[/i]. Because of this well-founded identity, I'm confident that this series, and Portal 2 especially, will continue to remain masterpieces of overall game design far into the future.

How to Answer ‚ÄúQuestion 9‚Äù (The Research Method question)

‚óè An introduction which makes it clear what your main line of argument is going to be (X is better than Y though both have advantages and disadvantages and other methods such as Z also have merit‚Ä¶) you might wish to introduce some of the key terminology that you will be using (Valid, reliable, trustworthy, biased, ethics, etc)

To pick up all 6 analysis marks and all 6 evaluation marks, your response needs to include the following:

‚óè Exploration of a range of factors analysing for each of these whether Method X or Method Y would be most beneficial- this will involve you discussing the positives and negatives of each method related to the factor (ie. cost, ease of carrying out, validity of data gathered response rate etc).

‚óè Ethical considerations.

‚óè Evidence of research in real life which shows these positives and negatives- you can include your own processes of research for the dissertation in this, as well as that of other researchers/ companies.

‚óè Consider an alternative method that is not mentioned in the question (* you technically only need to do this if the question only mentions one isolated method, but it is good practice to always mention an additional one anyway).

‚óè Links directly to the scenario in question throughout.

Do not:

‚óè Write a paragraph on Method X, followed by a separate paragraph on Y.
